程序包 org.elasticsearch.discovery.zen

类 SettingsBasedHostsProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.discovery.zen.SettingsBasedHostsProvider
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    UnicastHostsProvider
    public class SettingsBasedHostsProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements UnicastHostsProvider
    An implementation of UnicastHostsProvider that reads hosts/ports from the "discovery.zen.ping.unicast.hosts" node setting. If the port is left off an entry, a default port of 9300 is assumed. An example unicast hosts setting might look as follows: [67.81.244.10, 67.81.244.11:9305, 67.81.244.15:9400]

    • 嵌套类概要
